item.title: Markdown Language
item.description:
Markdown

Markdown is a lightweight markup language that you can use to add formatting elements to plaintext text documents. Created by John Gruber in 2004, Markdown is now one of the worldâ€™s most popular markup languages.

All the content on my website is written in Markdown, so here’s a brief introduction to its basic usage. Of course, you can also find more details on the official website.

Heading

Use a different number of “#” to adjust the level of the heading.
